verbs.description: After [V: being] routed in the 2016 presidential primaries , a motley band of unreformed Never Trump Republicans gathered this week to make their last stand in the Supreme Court .
After being [V: routed] [ARGM-LOC: in the 2016 presidential primaries] , a motley band of [ARG1: unreformed Never Trump Republicans] gathered this week to make their last stand in the Supreme Court .

[ARGM-TMP: After being routed in the 2016 presidential primaries] , [ARG1: a motley band of unreformed Never Trump Republicans] [V: gathered] [ARGM-TMP: this week] [ARGM-PRP: to make their last stand in the Supreme Court] .
After being routed in the 2016 presidential primaries , [ARG0: a motley band of unreformed Never Trump Republicans] gathered this week to [V: make] [ARG1: their last stand in the Supreme Court] .
